footer.description:
Bull Diary is your professional trading companion, designed to help traders analyze their performance, track portfolio growth, and compete in exciting tournaments.

Connect your exchange accounts, save your best trades to bookmarks, and join our growing community of traders striving for excellence in the cryptocurrency markets.

closed_title.already_joined: You have already joined this tournament!

label.name: Name
label.subject: Subject
label.agreement_key: I confirm that I use 'read-only' keys

intro.title:
Master Your
Trading Journey
intro.description:
Transform your trading experience with Bull Diary — the ultimate platform for professional traders.

Analyze your performance, track your progress, and compete with the best in exciting tournaments.
Join thousands of traders who have already elevated their skills and achieved consistent results.

manual.title: Get Started in 5 Simple Steps
manual.subtitle:
Designed by professional traders for traders of all levels — from beginners to advanced professionals.
Follow these steps to unlock your full trading potential.

step_1.title: Create Your Account
step_1.subtitle:
Sign up for Bull Diary and connect your exchange API keys securely.

Support for multiple exchanges and accounts — manage everything in one place. Your API keys are encrypted and stored safely with read-only permissions for maximum security.

step_2.title: Sync Data
step_2.subtitle: Our platform automatically imports your trading history from the last 180 days . Real-time synchronization keeps your data always up to date.

step_3.title: Trade
step_3.subtitle: Use your preferred trading strategy, signals, or analysis to make informed decisions. Open and close positions on your connected exchanges.

step_4.title: Record
step_4.subtitle: Review your trades on interactive charts and add detailed comments. Record your reasoning, emotions, and lessons learned for future reference.

step_5.title: Analyze
step_5.subtitle: Regularly review your trading performance and identify patterns. Learn from mistakes, refine your strategy, and continuously improve your skills.

step_2.title: Link
step_2.subtitle: Securely link your exchange accounts with read-only API keys

advantages.title:
Why Choose
Bull Diary?
advantages.subtitle:
Join thousands of traders who trust Bull Diary for their professional trading needs.
Experience the difference that makes us the preferred choice.

card_1.title: Safe
card_1.subtitle: Your API keys are encrypted and stored with read-only permissions. No trading operations are possible — only data import for analysis.

card_2.title: History
card_2.subtitle: Automatically import and store your entire trading history in one secure location. Access your data anytime, anywhere with full backup protection.

card_3.title: Fast
card_3.subtitle: Automated trade tracking eliminates manual data entry. Focus on strategy instead of spreadsheet management.

card_4.title: Sharing
card_4.subtitle: Create professional trading reports and share insights with your community. Build your reputation as a skilled trader.

card_5.title: Control
card_5.subtitle: Complete ownership of your data with permanent deletion option. Your privacy and control are our top priorities.

precedence.title: Compete & Win
precedence.subtitle: Join exciting trading tournaments and prove your skills against the best traders. Climb the leaderboard, earn recognition, and become a trading champion.

list_1.title: Fair Competition - Equal opportunities for all

list_5.title: Champion Status - Elite status with benefits

question.title: Need Help?
question.subtitle:
Our expert support team is here to help you succeed in your trading journey.

Get instant assistance with platform features, API connections, data synchronization, trading strategies, or any technical issues you might encounter. Whether you're a beginner learning the basics or an experienced trader optimizing your workflow, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Fill out the form below for personalized support, or contact us directly via email - our dedicated team is available 24/7 to ensure your trading success!

contacts.title:
Get in
Touch
contacts.description:
Need help with your trading platform or have questions about Bull Diary?

  • 24/7 Support: Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you with any questions.
  • Technical Help: Get assistance with platform features, API connections, and data synchronization.
  • Feedback Welcome: Share your suggestions and help us improve the trading experience.
  • Multiple Channels: Contact us via email, social media, or fill out the contact form.

settings.tuning_description:
Customize your trading experience with personalized settings.

  • Language: Switch between Russian and English interfaces.
  • Dark Theme: Enable dark mode for comfortable trading in low-light conditions.
  • Show Markers: Display visual indicators for buy/sell positions in trade tables.
  • Hide Amounts: Conceal financial data for privacy and security.
  • Text Highlighting: Color-code positive and negative values for better readability.
  • Hide Description: Hide page descriptions on mobile devices for easier reading.
  • Sidebar: Manage sidebar visibility - keep it open, closed, or unblocked for easy navigation.
settings.keys_description:
Connect your cryptocurrency exchange accounts to import trading data.

  • Supported Exchanges: Bybit, MEXC, and OKX with futures trading support.
  • API Keys: Securely store your read-only API keys for automatic data synchronization.
  • Data Sync: Import trading history from the last 180 days with real-time progress tracking.
  • Background Processing: Synchronization runs automatically without interrupting your workflow.
  • Multi-Exchange: Connect multiple exchanges simultaneously for comprehensive portfolio analysis.

Account

profile.subtitle:
Edit your profile information and account settings.

Update your name, last name, and phone number.
Change your avatar - supported formats: JPG, PNG, maximum file size: 5 megabytes.

Maintain your professional presence in the trading community.

Every bookmark is a step toward trading mastery.

Sign in to access your personalized trading dashboard, view your portfolio performance, analyze your trading history, and participate in exciting tournaments.

Continue your journey toward trading mastery with our professional tools and community.

Create your account to start analyzing your trades with professional tools, save your best transactions to bookmarks, participate in tournaments, and connect with other traders.

Begin your journey toward trading excellence today.

remove_user.title:
Delete
Account
remove_user.admin_error:
User not removed!
Please try again.
remove_user.user_error:
Account not removed!
Please try again.
remove_user.admin_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this user's account?

This action will permanently remove:
• User's trading history and data
• All saved bookmarks and analysis
• Tournament participation and achievements
• Profile information and settings

This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.
remove_user.user_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?

This action will permanently remove:
• Your complete trading history
• All saved bookmarks and analysis
• Tournament participation and achievements
• Profile information and settings

This action cannot be undone and all your data will be lost forever.

confirm.title:
Confirm
Action
confirm.keys_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to delete the API keys for this exchange?

This action will permanently remove your connection to the exchange. You will lose access to:
• Trading history and orders
• Saved bookmarks
• Wallet data and balance information

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.bookmark_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this trade from your bookmarks?

This will permanently delete:
• The saved trade entry
• Any comments or notes you added
• Associated trading analysis

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.tournament_user_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this user from the tournament?

This action will:
• Remove the user from all tournament activities
• Reset their tournament progress and rankings
• Delete their tournament statistics

This action cannot be undone.
confirm.tournament_remove_subtitle:
Are you sure you want to delete this tournament?

This action will permanently delete:
• All tournament data and settings
• Participant rankings and progress
• Tournament statistics and results
• All associated user achievements

This action cannot be undone.
